title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 24.9 - Reconsideration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 24.9 - Reconsideration

State Regulations

An application for reconsideration of a determination made by
the Committee on the Professions or by the Board of Regents following a

Committee on the Professions recommendation may be accepted upon a showing that
the original action was based on an error of law, or that there is new and
material evidence which was not previously available, or that circumstances
have changed subsequent to the original determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
24.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
